00018 class CMForm implements CMClass {

00026   return "1.0";

00035   return "1.0";

00047  public static function StripSlashesRecursive($value) {
00048   if(is_array($value)) {
00049    foreach($value as $k => $v)
00050     $value[$k] = CMForm::StripSlashesRecursive($v);
00051   } else $value = stripslashes($value);
00052   
00053   return $value;
00054  }
00055  
00068  public static function Request($objname) {
00069   return CMForm::StripSlashesRecursive($_REQUEST[$objname]);
00070  }
00071 
00080  public static function Get($objname) {
00081   return CMForm::StripSlashesRecursive($_GET[$objname]);
00082  }
00083 
00092  public static function Post($objname) {
00093   return CMForm::StripSlashesRecursive($_POST[$objname]);
00094  }

00106  private static function DefaultAttributes($a) {
00107   // firstly it must be an array
00108   if(!is_array($a))
00109    $a = array();
00110    
00111   $defaults = array(
00112    'caption' => false,
00113    'captionempty' => "",
00114    'class' => false,
00115    'custom' => false,
00116      'data' => false,
00117    'disabled' => false,
00118    'height' => false,
00119    'html' => false,
00120    'label' => false,
00121             'name' => "",
00122    'onblur' => false,
00123    'onchange' => false,
00124    'onclick' => false,
00125    'ondblclick' => false,
00126    'onfocus' => false,
00127    'onkeydown' => false,
00128    'onkeypress' => false,
00129    'onkeyup' => false,
00130    'onmousedown' => false,
00131    'onmouseout' => false,
00132    'onmousemove' => false,
00133    'onmouseup' => false,
00134    'onmouseover' => false,
00135    'onselect' => false,
00136    'readonly' => false,
00137    'style' => false,
00138    'tabindex' => false,
00139    'value' => "",
00140    'width' => false,
00141    'wrap' => "off",
00142     'id' => '$name'
00143   );
00144   
00145   foreach($defaults as $k => $v) {
00146    if(!isset($a[$k])) {
00147     if(substr($v, 0, 1) == '$')
00148      $a[$k] = $a[substr($v, 1)];
00149     else $a[$k] = $v;
00150    }
00151   }
00152   
00153   // convert SQL queries into data
00154   foreach($a as $k => $v) {
00155    if($v instanceof CMQueryProtocol) {
00156     // some attributes are special and require an array()
00157     if($k == 'data') {
00158      $a[$k] = array();
00159      while(($r = $v->fetch('line')) !== false)
00160       $a[$k][] = array($r[0], $r[1]);
00161     } else {
00162      $a[$k] = mysql_fetch_row($v);
00163      $a[$k] = $a[$k][0];
00164     }
00165    }
00166   }
00167    
00168   return $a;
00169  }
00170  
00181  private static function MainAttributes($a, $checkbox = false) {
00182   if($checkbox)
00183    $html = " name=\"$a[name][]\"";
00184   else $html = " name=\"$a[name]\"";
00185   $html .= " id=\"$a[id]\"";
00186   if($a['class']) $html .= " class=\"$a[class]\"";
00187   
00188   if($a['onblur']) $html .= " onblur=\"$a[onblur]\"";
00189   if($a['onchange']) $html .= " onchange=\"$a[onchange]\"";
00190   if($a['onclick']) $html .= " onclick=\"$a[onclick]\"";
00191   if($a['ondblclick']) $html .= " ondblclick=\"$a[ondblclick]\"";
00192   if($a['onfocus']) $html .= " onfocus=\"$a[onfocus]\"";
00193   if($a['onkeydown']) $html .= " onkeydown=\"$a[onkeydown]\"";
00194   if($a['onkeypress']) $html .= " onkeypress=\"$a[onkeypress]\"";
00195   if($a['onkeyup']) $html .= " onkeyup=\"$a[onkeyup]\"";
00196   if($a['onmousedown']) $html .= " onmousedown=\"$a[onmousedown]\"";
00197   if($a['onmouseout']) $html .= " onmouseout=\"$a[onmouseout]\"";
00198   if($a['onmousemove']) $html .= " onmousemove=\"$a[onmousemove]\"";
00199   if($a['onmouseup']) $html .= " onchange=\"$a[onmouseup]\"";
00200   if($a['onmouseover']) $html .= " onmouseover=\"$a[onmouseover]\"";
00201   if($a['onselect']) $html .= " onselect=\"$a[onselect]\"";
00202   
00203   if($a['style']) $html .= " style=\"$a[style]\"";
00204   if($a['disabled']) $html .= " disabled=\"disabled\"";
00205   if($a['readonly']) $html .= " readonly=\"readonly\"";
00206   if($a['label']) $html .= " label=\"$a[label]\"";
00207   if($a['tabindex']) $html .= " tabindex=\"$a[tabindex]\"";
00208   if($a['custom']) $html .= " $a[custom]";
00209   
00210   return $html;
00211  }
00212  
00219  public static function TextBox($a) {
00220   $a = CMForm::DefaultAttributes($a);
00221   if($a['caption']) {
00222    if($a['value'] == '')
00223     $a['value'] = $a['captionempty'];
00224    return $a['value'] . '&nbsp;';
00225   }
00226   $html = "<input type='text'" . CMForm::MainAttributes($a);
00227   $html .= ' value="' . $a['value'] . '"';
00228   $html .= " />";
00229   return $html;
00230  }
00231  
00237  public static function SubmitButton($a) {
00238   $a = CMForm::DefaultAttributes($a);
00239   if($a['caption']) {
00240    if($a['value'] == '')
00241     $a['value'] = $a['captionempty'];
00242    return $a['value'] . '&nbsp;';
00243   }
00244   
00245   if($a['name'] == '')
00246    $a['name'] = 'submit';
00247   
00248   if($a['value'] == '')
00249    $a['value'] = 'Submit';
00250   
00251   $html = "<input type='submit'" . CMForm::MainAttributes($a);
00252   $html .= ' value="' . $a['value'] . '"';
00253   $html .= " />";
00254   return $html;
00255  }

00337  public static function Menu($a) {
00338   $a = CMForm::DefaultAttributes($a);
00339   if($a['caption']) {
00340    if($a['value'] == '')
00341     $a['value'] = $a['captionempty'];
00342    return $a['value'] . '&nbsp;';
00343   }
00344   $html = "<select " . CMForm::MainAttributes($a) . ">";
00345   foreach($a['data'] as $d) {
00346    if(!is_array($d))
00347     $d = array($d, $d);
00348    $html .= '<option value="' . $d[0] . '"';
00349    if($d[0] == $a['value']) $html .= ' selected';
00350    $html .= '>';
00351    if($a['html'] === false)
00352     $html .= htmlspecialchars($d[1]);
00353    else $html .= $d[1];
00354    $html .= '</option>';
00355   }
00356   $html .= "</select>";
00357   return $html;
00358  }
00359  
00365  public static function Checkbox($a) {
00366   $a = CMForm::DefaultAttributes($a);
00367   if($a['caption']) {
00368    if($a['value'] == '')
00369     $a['value'] = $a['captionempty'];
00370    return $a['value'] . '&nbsp;';
00371   }
00372   $html = "<input type='checkbox' value='" . $a['value'] . "' " . CMForm::MainAttributes($a);
00373   if($a['checked'] != false)
00374    $html .= ' checked';
00375   $html .= " />";
00376   return $html;
00377  }
00378  
00384  public static function ListBox($a) {
00385   $a = CMForm::DefaultAttributes($a);
00386   if($a['height'] === false)
00387    $a['height'] = 5;
00388   $html = "<select " . CMForm::MainAttributes($a) . ' size="' . $a['height'] . '">';
00389   foreach($a['data'] as $value => $text) {
00390    $html .= '<option value="' . $value . '"';
00391    if($value == $a['value']) $html .= ' selected';
00392    $html .= '>';
00393    if($a['html'] === false)
00394     $html .= htmlspecialchars($text);
00395    else $html .= $text;
00396    $html .= '</option>';
00397   }
00398   $html .= "</select>";
00399   return $html;
00400  }
00401  
00407  public static function RadioGroup($a) {
00408   $a = CMForm::DefaultAttributes($a);
00409   $html = "";
00410   foreach($a['data'] as $value => $text) {
00411    $html .= '<input type="radio" value="' . $value . '"';
00412    if($value == $a['value']) $html .= ' checked';
00413    $html .= CMForm::MainAttributes($a) . ' />';
00414    if($a['html'] === false)
00415     $html .= htmlspecialchars($text);
00416    else $html .= $text;
00417    $html .= '&nbsp;';
00418   }
00419   return $html;
00420  }
00421  
00427  public static function CheckboxGroup($a) {
00428   $a = CMForm::DefaultAttributes($a);
00429   $html = "";
00430   foreach($a['data'] as $value => $text) {
00431    $html .= '<input type="checkbox" value="' . $value . '"';
00432    if(is_array($a['value']) && in_array($value, $a['value']))
00433      $html .= ' checked';
00434    elseif($value == $a['value']) $html .= ' checked';
00435    $html .= CMForm::MainAttributes($a, true) . ' />';
00436    if($a['html'] === false)
00437     $html .= htmlspecialchars($text);
00438    else $html .= $text;
00439    $html .= '&nbsp;';
00440   }
00441   return $html;
00442  }
00443  
00449  public static function TextArea($a) {
00450   $a = CMForm::DefaultAttributes($a);
00451   if($a['caption']) {
00452    if($a['value'] == '')
00453     $a['value'] = $a['captionempty'];
00454    return nl2br($a['value']) . '&nbsp;';
00455   }
00456   if($a['height'] === false)
00457    $a['height'] = 5;
00458   if($a['width'] === false)
00459    $a['width'] = 45;
00460   $html = "<textarea" . CMForm::MainAttributes($a) . " rows=\"$a[height]\" cols=\"$a[width]\" wrap=\"$a[wrap]\">";
00461   if($a['html'] === false)
00462    $html .= htmlspecialchars($a['value']);
00463   else $html .= $a['value'];
00464   $html .= "</textarea>";
00465   return $html;
00466  }
00467  
00471  public function __toString() {
00472   return "<" . get_class($this) . ">";
00473  }
